org.simplity.kernel.comp

Interface Component

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Function, ServiceInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFunction, BooleanDataType, DataType, DateDataType, ListService, Message, NumericDataType, Record, Service, Sql, StoredProcedure, SuggestionService, TextDataType

    public interface Component
    component of this application engine. Every component has to have some attributes, that are used by others. Hence we have some getters
    Author:
    simplity.org

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ComponentType getComponentType() 
      String getQualifiedName() 
      void getReady()
      Components may have to set-up their shops after loading the attributes.
      String getSimpleName() 
      int validate(ValidationContext ctx)
      Validate this component.

    • Method Detail

      • getSimpleName

        String getSimpleName()
        Returns:
        simple name, with no prefix (module). Component name is unique within a module, but may not be across modules. Hence a moduleName is to be used to refer to a components

      • getQualifiedName

        String getQualifiedName()
        Returns:
        qualified name. Dotted if you use modules and sub-modules. Similar to java class and package notation.

      • getReady

        void getReady()
        Components may have to set-up their shops after loading the attributes. Typically ensuring referential integrity, caching etc.. In case of components having sub-components, it is generally a good idea to have setUp() only for the parent component, from where you may trigger set-up of child components

      • validate

        int validate(ValidationContext ctx)
        Validate this component.
        Parameters:
        ctx - list to which errors if any are added
        Returns:
        return number of errors added to list

      • getComponentType

        ComponentType getComponentType()
        Returns:
        type of this component
